name: Reaction (Andrew Radford)
description:
Made as my major project for SAE, Reaction is a VR shooter, where when you die you can play with your previous self. 

In this game you must follow orders, and free the entity that's given you a second chance. On your way you must make it though the puzzles, and enemies that stand in your way.

Created in Unreal Engine 4, and developed for the HTC Vive. This should work with other headsets, although it has not been tested. I will be working to make the game compatible with other headsets.

Credits
Programming & Development
Andrew Radford

SFX & Music

Animation & Models
